item.title: Negative Integer Literals
item.description: TL;DR: Write your negative numbers in base-10, use consistent types & fixed width integers and wrap them in parentheses. negative numbers are represented in two’s complement form and, type promotion of a 32-bit integer to 64-bit integer preserves the value.
